Factsheet

Description

Maggie's Grinning Soul is a short investigation game made for the 37th Ludum Dare

History

This game was made on Unity. I was the only programmer in a team of 8 students. Basically, the game is a hidden object game : you find an object, it unlocks questions, one question will unlock an object, and so on. I had to make the game system, but also all the graphic and sound integration. Since the game system was simple, the game jam ran smoothly, and I had time to sleep and debug the game !

Features

  • Unity
  • A Ouija table
  • Sound integration using Wwise
  • Graphic assets integration
  • Implemented all the gameplay
  • A tool for designers to link objects to questions
  • 20th game of Ludum Dare 20th on overall ratings
